org.apache.cassandra.repair

Class SyncTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture<SyncStat>
      • org.apache.cassandra.repair.SyncTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<SyncStat>, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<SyncStat>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalSyncTask, RemoteSyncTask

    public abstract class SyncTask
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture<SyncStat>
implements java.lang.Runnable
    SyncTask will calculate the difference of MerkleTree between two nodes and perform necessary operation to repair replica.
